ygData.msgSnippet: Sky Knight laughed. Beserk guarded himself from the shots from the drone. He crossed his arms over and ducked his head. He snarled and charged at the standing

Sky Knight laughed. Beserk guarded himself from the shots from the 
drone. He crossed his arms over and ducked his head. He snarled and 
charged at the standing drone. He leaped up and kicked the drone in 
mid-air, sending it flying. He landed on the other's head.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Blazer::
> 
> Still holding the sword, one of the droids flies through the air, 
hitting the 
> other, both on them falling. The one on top stands up, spinning 
around and 
> firing at Berserk.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Blazer chuckles, looking at Beserk deal with the droids. "Or maybe 
I should 
> have gotten better ones."
